name: Unstable Adam's Unstable Diner
description:
Welcome to Unstable Adam's Unstable Diner, where the flavour is the experience.  

Patrons come from far and wide to sample Adam's fantastic flavour profiles, and enjoy the aromatic scents that the sandwiches create.

Today is your first day as a sandwich prep jockey, suit up and get ready to deliver tastes that will amaze.  You're job as the sandwich prep jockey is to assemble the sandwiches as the patrons have requested them.  Please hold all judgement of requests.

If the patron requests their sandwich be Healthy and Hot then you must provide at least one ingredient with the Healthy flavour and at least one ingredient with the Hot flavour.

---

Use the provided ingredients to create the flavour profiles that the patrons want

--- 

4 exciting game modes!

Trial, Timed, Relaxed, and Puzzle

Drag and drop controls!

Should be mobile friendly!
